EmailTemplate.subject: INVITATION - AECOM Norwich Annual Client Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us for drinks and canap√©s at AECOM's Annual Client Reception in our Norwich office
AECOM, 1st Floor, 3 St James Court, Whitefriars, Norwich NR3 1RJ* Thursday 27 November 2014, 6.00pm-9.00pm
Please RSVP to janet.gale@aecom.com before 14 November 2014.
*Please note, parking is not available on site
